text: 8.38 Over the period 2023-2038, Tower Hamlets is expected to see demand for an additional 283,000sqm of office floorspace and 77,000 sqm of industrial floorspace. 8.39 It is important to note that the Census 2021 data was collected during the COVID-19 pandemic, a time of rapid and unprecedented change. The national lockdown, associated guidance and furlough measures may have had an impact on the labour market and our ability to measure it. 28 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS VISION AND OBJECTIVESINTRODUCTION Town centres 8.40 Tower Hamlets is a diverse borough that contains a variety of town centres, each contributing to the vitality and vibrancy of the area. The borough contains parts of the London Planâ€™s Central Activities Zone (CAZ), as well as one metropolitan centre in Canary Wharf, eight district centres, three specialist centres, three CAZ centres, 16 neighbourhood centres, and 14 neighbourhood parades.
